newsitem.title: USA: FSA announces secondary market insurance.
newsitem.headline: FSA announces secondary market insurance.

text.p: Financial Security Assurance announces secondary market insurance on:
2.Puerto Rico Public Building Authority. Insurance is available on maturities 2005 and longer. There is no limit per firm. FSA has remaining secondary insurance capacity for:
--NYS Med Care (Mental) Insurance is available on maturities 2005 and longer. There is no par limit per firm.
For further details, please contact Tom Byrne, Greg Haggerty. or Alan Steinfeld at (212)826-0601. --U.S. Municipal Desk, 212-859-1650
